profiles.jd_text:
Job Description

Team Overview: 

The Assets, Formats & Placements team is part of our LinkedIn Marketing Solutions (Ads Technology) group. This team has a vision of building a content onboarding and asset generation platform, innovating in new ad formats and experimenting with new ad slot supply that can be monetized.

The team also owns vertical products like hosting live events and B2B marketing aspects for those events and the strategy to monetize creators & publishers that post high quality video content on LinkedIn.

Location: 

At LinkedIn, our approach to flexible work is centered on trust and optimized for culture, connection, clarity, and the evolving needs of our business. The work location of this role is hybrid, meaning it will be performed both from home and from a LinkedIn office on select days, as determined by the business needs of the team.

This role will  be based in New York, NY.

Responsibilities:

As a Principal AI Engineer you will be setting the technical direction and foundation to build and own algorithms, models, and systems that power our LinkedIn ad tech platform. We are looking for a high performing and high ambition tech lead who will use AI/ML to push the boundaries of our ad stack and meet the future needs of our B2B advertisers.

Define and execute technical vision for applying AI to accelerate the team’s roadmap which includes asset generation using LLMs, personalizing ads at scale and new workflows that guide advertisers to building higher performing ads.
Mentor and work with other Sr. Staff SWEs in the team to establish quality norms, processes and build a culture of operational excellence.
Partner with Product, Data Science, and AI Research teams to translate business goals into scalable AI-powered capabilities that improve the advertiser experience & ROI.
Establish best practices for experimentation, model evaluation, and responsible AI within the asset generation, ads personalization and supply expansion spaces.


Qualifications

Basic Qualifications:

5+ years as a Technical Leader (L7, Senior Staff, Principal, etc.) 
7+ years of industry experience with Machine Learning, AI, Data Engineering, or related solutions. 
Bachelor of Science (or higher, e.g., MS, or PhD) in Computer Science or related technical field involving coding, or equivalent technical experience.


Preferred Qualifications:

10+ years of industry experience (AI, Machine Learning, Data Science, or related) including prior experience working in the Tech domain. 
Master’s or PhD in Computer Science or a related discipline. 
BS and 12+ years of relevant work experience, MS and 10+ years of relevant work experience, or PhD and 8+ years of relevant work experience.
Previous design and implementation of solutions in highly distributed environments. 
Experience in the Advertising and Marketing domain.
Prior work designing and building scalable agentic systems.


Skills:

Technical Leadership
AI Engineering 
Enterprise ML Solutions 


You will Benefit from our Culture:

We strongly believe in the well-being of our employees and their families. That is why we offer generous health and wellness programs and time away for employees of all levels.

Qualifications
Intermediate proficiency in Python and SQL
Understanding of data analysis techniques and foundational concepts in Calculus, Statistics, and Linear Algebra
Experience with Data Science methodologies, including machine learning, regression, and classification
8 more items(s)
Benefits
Great Company Culture
The pay range for this position in New York City at the start of employment is expected to be $30 per Hour
However, base pay offered is based on market location, and may vary further depending on individualized factors for job candidates, such as job-related knowledge, skills, experience, and other objective business considerations
2 more items(s)
Responsibilities
Working in a dynamic environment, you will apply your analytical skills to drive impactful decisions and help build the future of interactive entertainment
Use statistical analysis, machine learning, and data visualization to uncover data patterns and test hypotheses
Collaborate with senior analytics staff to determine business needs and implement actionable solutions
